abstract: The start-up Tilera has picked a daunting path by opting to tackle Intel in the server chip market with a new product that it claims is the fastest chip ever built.
snippet: The start-up Tilera has picked a daunting path by opting to tackle Intel in the server chip market with a new product that it claims is the fastest chip ever built.
lead_paragraph: Update | 8:37 a.m.  This post has been updated to reflect reader’s concerns about language used to describe the relationship between software developers and the x86 instruction set.

headline.main: Tilera Taunts Intel With a 100-Core Chip
